    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Hi ha alguna equivalència entre l'escala Richter i l'escala Mercalli?</string>
            <string language="en">Is there anything in common between the Richter scale and the Mercalli scale?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gibt es alles im Common zwischen der Richterskala
und der Mercalli Skala?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Y a-t-il quelque chose en commun entre l'échelle
de Richter et l'échelle de Mercalli ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Há qualquer coisa na terra comum entre a escala 
de Richter e a escala de Mercalli?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È ci qualche cosa il in comune fra la scala di 
Richter e la scala di Mercalli?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπάρχει τίποτα από κοινού μεταξύ της κλίμακας 
Richter και της κλίμακας Mercalli;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la mesura dels efectes dels terratrèmols. Inclou enllaços externs per ampliar la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on measuring the effects of earthquakes. External links for further information are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">càlcul</string>
            <string language="en">calculation</string>
            <string language="es">cálculo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">catàstrofe</string>
            <string language="en">catastrophe</string>
            <string language="es">catástrofe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">earth sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exploració de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">exploration of the earth</string>
            <string language="es">exploración de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mesura</string>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
            <string language="es">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf dem Messen 
der Effekte von Erdbeben. Externe Links für weitere 
Informationen sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur mesurer les effets des 
tremblements de terre. Les liens externes pour de plus amples 
informations sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em medir os efeitos dos 
terremotos. As ligações externas para uma informação mais 
adicional são incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla misurazione degli effetti
dei terremoti. I collegamenti esterni per ulteriori informazioni
sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στη μέτρηση των αποτελεσμάτων
των σεισμών. Οι εξωτερικές συνδέσεις συμπεριλαμβάνονται για 
περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
